site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:10-9:30 AM on
6/13/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling cell phone (left message) and home
phone, and by texting (licensee replied no one available today). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:10-9:30 AM on

phone, and by texting (licensee replied no one available today). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
